title: FIFA 08
description:
FIFA 08 (named FIFA Soccer 08 in North America) is the 2008 installment of EA Sports' series of football video games. Developed by EA Canada, it is published by Electronic Arts worldwide under the EA Sports label. It was released on all popular gaming formats in September 2007 in Europe, Australia, and Asia, and in October 2007 in North America.

New features that were not in FIFA 07 include "Be a Pro Mode", where the player plays as only one player (the player can be changed) throughout the entire match.[3] This Idea was copied from the popular Fantasista in J-League Winning Eleven 2007 Club Championship However, this mode is not available for goalkeepers.

The Manager Mode on 08 has few enhancements from its predecessor, however, some of the new features include the chance to schedule training on certain dates, via the manager's calendar, and the option to play up to four pre-season friendlies.

FIFA 08 includes 621 licensed teams, 43 national teams, with 30 leagues and more than 15,000 licensed players. Several teams from other leagues also appear in a "Rest of World" category. Of the 621 teams that comprise the game, 29 appear unlicensed, 13 of them being national teams.

Minimum Requirements
1. CPU Speed : 1.3 GHz (Vista requires 1.5 GHz)
2. RAM : 256 MB (Windows Vista requires 512MB RAM)
3. Operating System : Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7/8/8.1
4. Video Card : Supported chipsets: NVIDIA GeForce3 or greater (GeForce4 MX series not supported); ATI Radeon 8500 or greater; Intel 915/945/950/GMA 3000; S3 DeltaChrome S4, S3 Graphics Chrome S27 (S3 video cards not supported under Windows Vista). Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required.
5. DirectX Version : 9.0c (included)
6. Sound Card : Yes
7. Free Disk Space : 3.92 GB
8. DVD-ROM : 8X speed DVD-ROM.

Recommended Requirements
1. CPU Speed : 2 GHz
2. RAM : 1 GB
3. Operating System : Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1
4. Video Card : NVIDIA GeForce 6600+ /ATI Radeon 9800+ or better
5. DirectX Version : 9.0c (included)
6. Sound Card : Yes
7. Free Disk Space : 4 GB
8. DVD-ROM : 8X speed DVD-ROM.
